name: Sword of Eutomia
description:
Sword of Eutomia

750 years ago, Meji, the great fighter, expelled Kenga, the evil emperor, to bring peace to the land of Eutomia. In honor of Meji's victory, every 50 years, people celebrate Kamikanga to remember what he did. However, one day, things got ugly...

Right now, the game is just a small demo.  You can explore the area a little bit, but that's about it. I don't know how to properly make games, so feedback is appreciated.

(To access the DEBUG menu, hold UP, RIGHT, A and B before the title screen loads.)
